description: Try our easy to follow Gluten-Free Breakfast Pancakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet pancake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Banana,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Gluten-Free Breakfast Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs extra virgin olive oil (to grease pan)

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare Gluten-Free Buttermilk Pancake Mix according to instructions on the bottle.
Heat a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat and grease lightly with a little butter.
Pour mixture into pan to make 8cm diameter pancakes. Cook until bubbles show on the surface then flip and cook other side until golden.
Transfer to plates, top with yoghurt, sliced banana and strawberries and drizzle with a little honey.
